sentences.english: The two main classes of petrochemicals are olefins and aromatics.
sentences.chinese: 石化的兩類主要產品是烯烴和芳烴。

sentences.english: The aromatic extraction laboratory scale test was mainly introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 主要介紹以純糠醛爲溶劑的芳烴抽提小試實驗。

sentences.english: Also, PAHs may affect the fetus’ DNA directly.
sentences.chinese: 多環芳烴同樣對胎兒的DNA產生直接影響。

sentences.english: The aromatic extraction laboratory scale test taking the pure furfural as solvent was mainly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 主要介紹以純糠醛爲溶劑的芳烴抽提小試實驗。

sentences.english: PAHs are in car or bus exhaust and emissions from residential heating and power generation.
sentences.chinese: 多環芳烴來自於汽車尾氣以及住宅供暖和發電的排放。

sentences.english: On Earth, polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons are found on burnt toast and in automobile exhaust.
sentences.chinese: 在地球上，烤糊的麪包和汽車尾氣裏都含有稠環芳烴。

sentences.english: Results: Some sorts of perchlorinated polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbon and methylsilsesquixane were synthesized.
sentences.chinese: 合成得到了全氯化多環芳烴和硅倍半氧烷。

sentences.english: Pyrene is a representative compound among PAH.
sentences.chinese: 芘是多環芳烴的一個代表性化合物。

sentences.english: Calixarenes is a kind of cyclic host molecule with cavity.
sentences.chinese: 杯芳烴是一類具有大小不等的空腔分子。

sentences.english: The model can be used to explain the dehalogenation mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 該模型可用於解釋滷代芳烴化合物還原脫滷的機理。

sentences.english: N-formylmorpholine is a new aromatics extraction solvent.
sentences.chinese: 甲酰嗎啉是新一代芳烴萃取溶劑。

sentences.english: The soil PAHs contents in Tianjin urban District and Xiqing District exceeded the target value most seriously.
sentences.chinese: 西青區和市區是土壤多環芳烴含量超標最嚴重的區域。

sentences.english: The recent pr in calixarene-containing monomers and their polymerization methodology is reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 主要闡述了含杯芳烴單體及其聚合方法的研究進展。

sentences.english: Peroxidation of alkyl aromatics is the key step to synthesis of phenols.
sentences.chinese: 烷基芳烴過氧化反應是酚類合成反應的關鍵步驟。

sentences.english: The aromatics are ringed hydrocarbons, such as benzene, toluene and xylene. Benzene is used to make polystyrenes (e.g.
sentences.chinese: 芳烴是環狀碳氫化合物，如苯，甲苯和二甲苯。

sentences.english: The distillation range of aromatic materials was determined by Raman spectroscopic method.
sentences.chinese: 應用拉曼光譜法測定了芳烴物料的餾程。
